Refactoring `SendGroupAiRecordReq` based on OpenAPI spec: Added `group_id` (str | int), `character` (str), and `text` (str) with descriptions. All are required. Refactored `SendGroupAiRecordRes` to match the response schema: Defined nested `Data` model with `message_id` (str). `SendGroupAiRecordRes` now includes `status` (str), `retcode` (int), `data` (Data), `message` (str), `wording` (str), and `echo` (str | None), with descriptions. Removed unused imports (`typing.Any`). Ensured all fields have type annotations and descriptions using `Field`. Followed encoding guidelines (using `| None`).
